document.full_text: canada's largest software company open text corp has strong prospects for growth partly due to its solid pipeline, analysts said, and raised their price target on the stock, a day after it posted a jump in quarterly profit.
document.title: open text poised to grow due to solid pipeline: analysts
lines_and_colors: canada's largest software company open text corp has strong prospects for growth partly due to its solid pipeline, analysts said, and raised their price target on the stock, a day after it posted a jump in quarterly profit.
